attributes.action: Bring in a law that stops men accused of rape being named until they are convicted
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many times, men accused of rape and then acquitted, have their details splashed all over the media before a conviction has even been gained. Too many times, men's lives are ruined when rape allegations are proved to be false and malicious and despite their innocence, they will forever have this hanging around their necks as most people believe there is no smoke without fire.
